front.div:
Original OHROPAX Classic ear plugs protect your
ears from sound and irritating noises. Ideal for
sleep, relaxation, wellbeing and meditation. Also
recommended for concentrated work, DIY and
loud music. OHROPAX Classic also protects your
ears from water and wind.

OHROPAX Classic has been an established noise
protection product since 1907. The unique
formulation – cotton wool soaked in a mixture of
Vaseline and paraffin wax – was so perfect right from
the outset that it has remained practically unchanged
up until the present day.
The ingredients are gentle to the skin and
hypoallergenic. The ear plugs can also be ideally
adjusted to fit every auditory canal and considerably
reduce the effects of noise pollution. The wearing
comfort is excellent as no sensation of pressure
occurs in the ear. The snug material adheres well to
the skin and enables secure positioning. The flesh-
colored ear plugs look discreet when worn.
